title: MAG 137 - Nemesis Transcript
text:
for more clues to just drop into my lap. Everyone else is running towards 
something, or running away and I… 
(Heavy sigh.) 
I don’t know what I’m doing. I’m just tired. Think I might go lie down a while. 
Get a cup of tea. Heh. Daisy’s got me listening to The Archers. I hate it. But it 
feels nice to hate something that can’t hurt me. I don’t know. That’s it, I, I 
guess. 
End recording. 
[Tape clicks off.] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme – Outro]

The Magnus Archives – 137 – Nemesis 
 
12 
 
It featured: Jonathan Sims as the Archivist and Sue Sims as Gertrude Robinson.
